content.description: Just right of Laidback Steve. Start matched on a sloper edge, poor feet on crystals. Big move to half pad sloper crimp followed by another big move. Crack is off...so a bit of eliminate but great movement on bad but comfortable holds.
content.location: On the Big Air boulder, facing grandmas hump, to the right of Laidack Steve.

content.description: Fun easy crack climb. Sit start in the cracks, then work your way up to top out.
content.location: Start on the large crack on the side of the Big Air boulder facing Grandma's Hump, work up the crack and top out.

content.description: Cool movement and hand Sequence. Start on the ledge to the right of Laidback Steve, work left up the arete keeping feet below...find the tiny feet and work your way to the top.
content.location: 8 feet to the right of Laidback Steve on the Big Air boulder.

content.description: Sit start on the crack in the center of the Big Air Boulder on the opposite side of the boulder from Laidback Steve. Work up the crack and rails to the big ledge and top out.
content.location: Starts on the side of the boulder facing away from Grandma's Hump and towards the Invisible boulder.

content.description: Sit start on the arete to the left of Laidback Steve, work up the arete, rest at the Laidback Steve crack, and then finish at the dip in the highest point on the boulder above Shadow of Reason.
content.location: Left of Laidback Steve on the arete.

content.description: Smaller boulder just before Grandma's Hump.  A bunch of decent crack problems and a couple hard crimpy problems.
